samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: The sample demonstrates the default functionalities of the Toolbar component which place commands with the scrollable mode in Vue platform.

samples.name: Popup
samples.description: The sample exposes popup mode of Toolbar component which configures overflowing toolbar commands inside a popup based on priority in Vue platform.

samples.name: Template
samples.description: The sample demonstrates the customizing toolbar with other components using the template functionalities.

samples.name: Alignment
samples.description: This sample demonstrates how to align commands in left, right and center position in Toolbar component in Vue platform.

samples.name: Keyboard Interaction
samples.description: This sample showcases the keyboard shortcuts applicable on Toolbar in Vue platform.
